name: LogicBots
blurb: Design, build and wire up your own unique robot to complete challenging logic puzzles.

rewards.reward:
Backer:

A huge thank you.

You also receive the status of 'Backer' on Incandescent Games website giving you access to private Backer forums which will show you the latest updates of the game.

Game Backer:

You will receive a digital copy of the game for PC upon release and your name in the credits as a Kickstarter backer.

You also receive the status of 'Game Backer' on Incandescent Games website giving you access to private Backer forums which will show you the latest updates of the game.

Beta Backer:

You receive a digital copy of the game for PC upon release and your name in the credits as a Kickstarter backer. Additionally you will be invited into the early Beta version to test the game out.

You also receive the status of 'Beta Backer' on Incandescent Games website giving you access to private Backer forums which will show you the latest updates of the game. Along with the private forums you will have access to the Beta forums once the Beta version is released.

Beta Backer + Poster:  The same rewards as 'Beta Backer' but you also receive a limited edition signed  A2 (594 x 420 mm) poster for the game.  There will be a \u00a35 shipping fee to anyone outside of the UK.

Education Backer: You will receive a special version of LogicBots which allows for multiple pc installation for educational purposes.  You must be able to prove that you are part of an educational organisation.\r\nThis is NOT a student version of the game this is for educational bodies only.

Alpha Backer:

You receive a digital copy of the game for PC upon release and your name in the credits as a Kickstarter backer and Alpha tester.  You will also be invited into the limited early Alpha version of the game and your feedback will be taken into account. You will get Beta access to the game too.

You also receive the status of 'Alpha Backer' on Incandescent Games website giving you access to private Backer forums which will show you the latest updates of the game. Along with the private forums you will have access to the Beta and Alpha forums once each of the versions are released.

Alpha Backer + Poster: The same rewards as 'Alpha Backer' but you also receive a limited edition signed A2 (594 x 420 mm) poster for the game. There will be a \u00a35 shipping fee to anyone outside of the UK.

Enthusiast:

You will receive a limited edition signed poster for the game, a limited edition signed boxed version of the game, four extra copy's of the game to give to your friends and a special Enthusiast backer place on the credits.

On the Incandescent Games website you will receive the status of 'Enthusiast' which will give you access to all the previously mentioned forums.

You will also get all of the above rewards.

There will be a £5 shipping fee to anyone outside of the UK.

Level Designer:

You will get to design a special level for the game. This can be done from a drawing or a written description which I can then discuss with you so I can create the level you want. You will get to see the level through its creation and be the first to test it out! You will also get your name in the credits for your level design.

On the Incandescent Games website you will receive the status of 'Level Designer' which will give you access to all the previously mentioned forums.

You will also get all of the above rewards, except Robot Designer.

Robot Designer:

You will get to design your own unique robot for the game.  This can be done from a drawing, or a written description which I can then discuss with you so I can create the robot you want.  There will be limitations on what can be created such as size and complexity but I will be as flexible as I can be.  I will also let you do the paint job for your robot if you wish or I can work from your sketch.  You will get to see the robot through its creation and be the first to test it out!  You will also get your name in the credits for your robot design.

On the Incandescent Games website you will receive the status of 'Robot Designer' which will give you access to all the previously mentioned forums.

You will also get all of the above rewards, except Level Designer.

Ultimate Backer:

All above awards including Level Designer and Robot Designer. You get one of the area characters designed in your likeness and named after you (see rewards for more details) and you will also receive an exclusive LogicBots t-shirt.

On the Incandescent Games website you will receive the status of 'Ultimate Backer' which will give you access to all the previously mentioned forums.
